alert.note: Alert for Bienville; Claiborne; Lincoln; Webster (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued November 29 at 8:44PM CST by NWS Shreveport
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of east central Webster, southeastern Claiborne, north central Bienville and northwestern Lincoln Parishes through 930 PM CST... At 844 PM CST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Minden, moving northeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Minden, Homer, Dubberly, Athens, Lisbon, Holly Springs, Antioch, Summerfield, Aycock, Spring Lake, Lake Clairborne, Corinth and Ada. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
